text:
Just chiming in on this as I can see where Carter is coming from.

I think being able to access the objectid and type could help with conditionally showing info on the cards.

<@U01QVR44MEY> Would you say a use case for this would be having a card that displays the same info for a contact/company but then if it’s on a company record, display additional info/content along with it?
<@U2H3TT8F2> 100% that's a great use case (actually something someone has asked me about in the past), just really tough to do it right now because of the hardcoding
phew, thanks for the update… you had me worried there.

:slightly_smiling_face: my concern was for the small customers, who have been using a Custom CRM Card for years. Only a few of my integration customers have Enterprise. AND, they’re the ones that I’m developing for - a new version with the new toys!
